Package org.apache.juneau.rest.util

Class CachingHttpServletResponse

java.lang.Object
jakarta.servlet.ServletResponseWrapper
jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
org.apache.juneau.rest.util.CachingHttpServletResponse
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, jakarta.servlet.ServletResponse
public class CachingHttpServletResponse extends jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
Wraps an HttpServletResponse and caches the output stream in a separate buffer for debugging purposes.
See Also:
